sentences.sContent: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
...What does the company Procter & Gamble owe its success to...

synos.tran: 欠；感激；应给予；应该把……归功于

trans.tranCn: 欠； 应把…归功于； 感激， 感恩
trans.tranOther: to be successful because of the good effect or influence of something or someone
